Open your KC Savings Account

Manage your money with ease while promoting the habit of savings.

Apply Now See Requirements

KC Savings Account Requirements

Low Collateral

  • Get a minimum of N1,000,000 and more without collateral

Low Interest Rates

  • Enjoy effective interest rates of 24-40% per annum

Quick Loan Approvals

  • Approval in 24-72 hours

How to open a KC Savings Account

Confirm loan eligibility

Confirm your eligibility for a KC Micro loan by logging into your dashboard to see available offers.

Provide documentation

Provide the relevant documentation and information to be processed for the KC Micro Loan.

Receive your loan

We'll review your application and send the money to your account within 1-2 business days.

Apply Now

Open a Personal Account

We understand that managing your personal finances is crucial for your peace of mind and financial well-being. Our personal accounts are designed to provide you with convenient and flexible banking solutions to meet your daily financial needs.

Internet Banking

Open a Corporate Account

Our corporate accounts are specifically designed to help you manage your business finances efficiently and effectively. Whether you're a startup, small business, or established enterprise, we have the right account to suit yqrrour needs.
